page.title: 20THE TWENTIETH CENTURY
page.content: The twentieth century is filled with computers, videos, compact discs and stereos. In nearly every home there is at least one of these items. When my parents were my age they had none of these. Some people do not like computers becausethey think that they will take over in factories and offices and then people wont have jobs. At the beginning of the twentieth century jobs were easy to find but now, near the end of the century, jobs are hard to find. When I start looking for a job it will be very hard to find one. Even if I have good qualifications I may not get a job. I hope that the twenty-first century will be much better than this one, and that computers will not have taken over everything.
